comments.html: There is a recorded webinar. This refers to an interactive in person workshop where the logistics to effectively record/capture the content are more difficult.
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html:
@Anonymous#1: Anonymous#2 totally got it.

First, you need a recording crew if you want to have good recording (yeah, I did use GoPro a few times, but the quality is what it is).

Next, if you want to publish the materials, you better get the release forms signed by every attendee... and them some of them won't ask any questions.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: why not to record the webinar? open source is the way these days Ivan...
comments.name: Anonymous
